infoSections.title: Budget Overview
infoSections.content:
• Total Budget: ₹2.4-3.2 lakh (S$3,600-4,800) for 8 people
  • Per Person: ₹30,000-40,000 (S$450-600)
  • Estimated Spend: S$2,050-2,650 total using discounted tickets
  • Exchange Rate: 1 SGD = ₹66.44 (June 2025)

infoSections.title: Transportation Tips
infoSections.content:
• Airport Transfers: Book 9-seater maxi cab for groups (S$85-95)
  • Public Transport: Buy Tourist Pass (S$29) for 3-day unlimited travel
  • Ride-hailing: Use Grab or Gojek, select 6-seater options
  • MRT: Avoid peak hours 7:30-9:30 AM and 5:30-7:30 PM

infoSections.title: Weather Strategy
infoSections.content:
• Temperature: 27-32°C with high humidity
  • Best Times: Early morning (6-10 AM) and evening (6-10 PM)
  • Afternoon: Plan indoor activities 10 AM-4 PM
  • Essentials: Umbrella, sunscreen SPF 50+, light clothing

infoSections.title: Food Recommendations
infoSections.content:
• Must-Try Dishes: Hainanese Chicken Rice, Laksa, Satay, Chili Crab
  • Hawker Centers: Maxwell, Lau Pa Sat, Old Airport Road, Newton
  • Budget: S$5-10 per person at hawker centers
  • Splurge: Violet Oon, Jumbo Seafood for special meals
